course_description: Together, this course and [_8.06 Quantum Physics III_](https://ocwnext.odl.mit.edu/courses/8-06-quantum-physics-iii-spring-2018/) cover quantum physics with applications drawn from modern physics. Topics covered in this course include the general formalism of quantum mechanics, harmonic oscillator, quantum mechanics in three-dimensions, angular momentum, spin, and addition of angular momentum.
